title: Anyone know if the LA2 Server is dead?
body: My account is in NA, but after moving to Bolivia my ping gets pretty terrible to play with in normal games. I've been wanting to make the transfer to LA2 for better ping, but not sure If It's a dead server or not lol

replies.body: We don't have a tool to show how many players are active on each server, but if you check out [**op.gg**](https://las.op.gg/statistics/champion/) you can get a general idea of the activity on that server. The link I gave will take you directly to server stats for LA2, so you can get a good idea of how popular it is that way.
